entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Fog patches this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:43 AM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:43 AM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
